attributes.action: Stop the closure of live music venues like the Half Moon Putney.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Half Moon in Putney has been hosting live music since 1963 and a stepping stone for emerging talent. They are threatening closure on 31 January 2010. There have been many similar venues closing down and it needs to stop now! We need the government to look at how they can help prevent venues like the Half Moon in Putney from closing.

rejection.details: This is probably a matter that you should take to your local council first: http://www.wandsworth.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
